creator: Stashcook
descriptionHtml:
Stash. Organise. Cook. Finding the right recipe is the hard bit. Storing and cooking them shouldn't be. Keep all your recipes in one place with Stashcook.

Instead of saving recipes in multiple places such as your browser bookmarks, images, by memory why not keep them neatly organised in one place using one app. That is where Stashcook comes in. Once you have stashed (saved) a recipe it is yours to edit, share and cook when and where you want.

No Limits
Stash as many recipes as you like. Edit recipes the way you want to. No charges, no special membership needed.

Always available
You don't need an internet connection to view your recipes. Once they are stashed they are always available to view on your device.

Stash. recipes from ANYWHERE
You can stash recipes from any recipe website. Stash recipes from All recipes, BBC Good Food, food blogs, Pinterest and many more. If you have a photo library full of recipes, stash and organise them all with little effort.
- save recipes from any recipe website
- edit recipes to match your tastes

Organise. recipes into collections
Use collections to create custom categories for your recipes. Easily find recipes with collection. Looking for a quick lunch recipe? Just look in the "Less than 10 minutes" collection you created.
- customise it your way
- filter recipes by name or ingredients to easily find the recipe you want

Cook.
Following some recipes can be difficult, we understand this and want to help. Stashcook has been designed to make cooking recipes easier with a simple, clutter free view of the ingredients and method.
- less clicks to follow
- less stress to make
- less time wasted

Stash. Organise. Cook. If you have any feedback we want to hear from you. Send us your ideas from within the app using the "Leave Feedback" button or email us at hello@stashcook.com
descriptionShort: Stash. Organise. Cook. Simple recipe management.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Stash. Code. Release. This release includes the ability to add a recipe to a collection from the recipe page. It also introduces style changes to the home page allowing you to see more recipes while scrolling. As well as the normal performance improvements and bug fixes.

title: Stashcook: Recipe manager and editor

creator: Stashcook
descriptionHtml:
Keep your recipes organised. Create weekly meal plans and cook from your own recipe book.

Have you ever lost a great recipe? Stashcook to the rescue. Stashcook is your own recipe keeper and virtual cook book, never again will you lose a delicious recipe.

💾 Save recipes from ANYWHERE!
Use the stash button to save recipes from any website on the internet. This includes BBC Good Food, Pinterest, Food Network, and Epicurious to name but a few.

📆 Meal planning
What's on the menu today? Simply check your weekly meal planner. Prepare meal plans and organise your week. Rearrange based on what you fancy that day. Add notes to make sure you don't forget to use those leftovers or your plans to eat out. Stashcook can also help save money and decrease food waste by reducing your weekly shopping list to only what you need.

🤓 Organise recipes into collections
Use collections to group recipes. Need a quick dinner option? Just look in the "10-minute dinners" collection you made.

🍳 Cook
Stashcook aims to make following a recipe easier. It has been created with simplicity in mind and removes the annoying clutter found on recipe sites.

💸 Free - No Limits
Stash as many recipes as you like. Prepare meal plans every week without restrictions. No charges, no membership required.
descriptionShort: Get recipes organised. Create weekly meal plans & cook from your own recipe book

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The meal planner has arrived! This version sees the addition of the Stashcook weekly meal planner. It allows you to organise your meals with a few simple taps. Including the ability to add notes to the planner for those meals or dinner plans you don't have a recipe for.

title: Shopping List, Meal Planner & Recipe Keeper

creator: Stashcook
descriptionHtml:
Organise your recipes. Use the meal planner to create weekly meal plans. Create shopping lists with ease and cook from your own recipe book.

Have you ever lost a great recipe? Stashcook to the rescue. Stashcook is your own recipe keeper and virtual cookbook, never again will you lose a delicious recipe.

💾 Save recipes from ANYWHERE!
Use the stash button to save recipes from any website on the internet. This includes BBC Good Food, Pinterest, Food Network, and Epicurious to name but a few.

📆 Meal planning
What's on the menu today? Simply check your weekly meal planner. Prepare meal plans and organise your week. Rearrange based on what you fancy that day. Add notes to make sure you don't forget to use those leftovers or your plans to eat out. Organising your meals with Stashcook and only buy what you need, saving you money and decreasing your food waste.

🛒 Shopping list
Simplify shopping! Add all the ingredients from any of your recipes. Then manually add any other items you need and let Stashcook organise them by supermarket aisle. Never forget the milk again!

👪 Share
With Stashcook's Family Share feature you can keep up to 6 accounts in sync and automatically share your recipes, meals and shopping lists. Making it super easy for households to meal plan and shop as a team.

🤓 Organise recipes into collections
Use collections to group recipes. Need a quick dinner option? Just look in the "10-minute dinners" collection you made.

🍳 Cook
Stashcook aims to make following a recipe easier. It has been created with simplicity in mind and removes the annoying clutter often seen alongside recipes. Not only that but it has handy functions to scale ingredients and lock the screen, saving you the hassle of getting messy fingers all over your clean screen.

💸 No Limits
Stash as many recipes as you like. Prepare meal plans every week without restrictions. No charges, no membership required. Only upgrade to Premium if you want the extra features.

Stash. Plan. Cook. with Stashcook

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This release includes in-depth nutritional information about the recipes you stash! You can now view the calories, protein, fats and much more for each of your recipes. Lastly, Stashcook has included a handy A-E rating showing how nutritious a recipe is, helping you understand your recipes at a glance.

Streamline your meal planning with our meal planner app. Find, store and whisk up healthy food recipes, cooklist, and grocery lists for any diet, all in one place. For any home chef looking to make tasty meals.

Have you ever lost a great recipe? Stashcook to the rescue. Stashcook is your personal recipe keeper and virtual cookbook. Never again will you lose a delicious recipe.

💾 Save recipes from ANYWHERE!
Use the stash button to save recipes from any website on the internet and access them anytime, anywhere with our easy recipe keeper. This includes BBC Good Food, Pinterest, Food Network, and Epicurious, to name but a few.

📆 Meal Planning
What's on the menu today? Check your weekly meal planner. Prepare meal plans and organise your week. Rearrange based on what you fancy that day. Add notes to ensure you remember to use those leftovers or your plans to eat out. Organize your meals with Stashcook and only buy what you need, saving you money and decreasing your food waste. Meal planning made easy.

🛒 Shopping List
Simplify shopping grocery! Add all the ingredients from any of your recipes. Then manually add any other items you need and let Stashcook organise them by supermarket aisle. Never again will you forget the milk!

👪 Share
With Stashcook's Family Share feature, you can sync up to 6 accounts and automatically share your recipes, meals and grocery lists. Making it super easy for households to meal plan and shop as a team.

🤓 Organize Healthy Recipes into Collections
Use collections to group healthy & easy recipes. Need a quick dinner option? Just look in the "10-minute dinners" collection you made. You can store easy recipes from any source and add them to collections that match your dinner ideas:
🍴 Chilli & paprika recipes
🍴 Air fryer recipes
🍴 Vegan recipes
🍴 Low calorie recipes
🍴 Keto diet recipes
🍴 Low carb recipes

🍳 Cook
Stashcook aims to make following a recipe easier. It has been created with simplicity in mind and removes the annoying clutter often seen alongside recipes. It also has handy functions to scale ingredients and lock the screen, saving you the hassle of getting messy fingers all over your clean screen.

📊 Nutritional analysis
Get in-depth analysis for any of your stashed recipes. Also, find out which ingredients contribute the most to Calories, Proteins, Carbohydrates, Fats, Sugars and Sodium so you can take control of your diet and plan your food recipes to fit your goals.

💸 No Limits
Stash as many recipes as you like. Prepare meal plans every week without restrictions. No charges and no membership is required. Only upgrade to Premium if you want the extra features.

Stash. Plan. Cook. with Stashcook
descriptionShort: Stashcook Easy Meal Prep: Healthy diet food recipes, cooklist, weekly meal plans
